##### ECL807 Advanced Field School in Computational Ecology 2023
Summer 2023, *Université de Sherbrooke and Université Laval*\
[{{< fa building-columns >}} admission](https://sentinellenord.ulaval.ca/en/ecology2023), [{{< fa star >}} Sentinelle Nord](https://sentinellenord.ulaval.ca/en
)

![We played the TrophIE Game during the Advanced Field School in Computational Ecology. This game simulates predator-prey dynamics by dividing players into three groups: top predators, intermediate predators, and prey. Prey could protect themselves from top predators in pre-installed shelters, but not from intermediate predators (!). The goal of the game was to avoid being killed and collect enough resources to survive. We played in Parc Eco (Quebec), a forest environment. We collected geographical and interaction data using electronic devices during the game and analyzed them for a class project. Picture credit: Sentinelle Nord, Université Laval.](pictures/courses/group_dead.jpg){width=400px}
